title: Relates to suspending the granting of charters for proposed charter schools not acted upon prior to April 1, 2011
summary: Relates to suspending the granting of charters for proposed charter schools not acted upon prior to April 1, 2011; provides that no further action shall be taken for charter schools where classes have not commenced prior to September 2, 2011.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to suspending the granting of charters for proposed charter schools not acted upon prior to April 1, 2011; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
